unnormalised: Hey guys, any update on Bumrah's injury? Heard he might miss the Asia Cup. That's a big blow for India! Hopefully, it's not like that "Dangal" scene where the wrestler gets seriously hurt. Praying he recovers quickly, maybe with some good Ayurvedic treatment from Kerala. Also, what about Pant? The NCA guys must be working hard to get him back on the field. Get well soon, fellas!
normalised: Hey guys, any update on Bumrah's injury? Heard he might miss the Asia Cup. That's a big blow for India! Hopefully, it's not like that "Dangal" scene where the wrestler gets seriously hurt. Praying he recovers quickly, maybe with some good Ayurvedic treatment from Kerala. Also, what about Pant? The N C A guys must be working hard to get him back on the field. Get well soon, fellas!
